title: Phantom Doctrine

title: Phantom Doctrine
notes: crashes immediately after showing splash screen, probably when trying to switch to full screen

title: Phantom Doctrine
notes:
Running with a "-WINDOWED" flag gets the game running, borderless window mode works as well, fullscreen crashes on start
Stable 60FPS
Ambient sounds(rain, wind, car engine, etc) play way louder than all other, gets real annoying real quick
